Meanings: محاسبه شده و بدست آمده از لاگ نوترون
No Sample, also write as : N
فاصله ای از چاه که به هر دلیلی فاقد نمونە حفاری می‌باشد
Nipple Up, also write as : NU
Not Available, also refer to as : N/A
همچنین بصورت N/A نیز نوشته می‌شود
Clays that are encountered when drilling various formations; they may or may not be incorporated purposely into the mud system
A mixture of hydrocarbons and varying quantities of nonhydrocarbons that exist either in the gaseous phase or in solution with crude oil in natural underground reservoirs
Those portions of reservoir gas which are liquefied at the surface in field facilities or gas processing plants
near Bit stabiliser, also write with capital letters as : NBS
NEUTRON COLLAR LOG, Log Curve name
northeast, mostly write with capital letters as : NE

A tool placed near the Bit and often above it in the Drilling Assembly and used to change the deviation angle in a Well by controlling the location of the contact point between the Hole and Drill Collars. Conversely, stabilizers are used to maintain correct Hole angle. 2. A vessel in which hydrocarbon vapors are separated from liquids
جهت اطلاعات بیشتر به لغت استابیلایزر مراجعه فرمایید
A cement with no additives other than water
The tendency of a metal bar or pipe to taper to a reduced diameter at some point when subjected to excessive longitudinal stress. See also : Bottleneck
A globe valve that contains a sharp, pointed, needle
like plug that is driven into and out of a cone
shaped seat to control accurately a relatively small rate of fluid flow. In a fuel injector, the fuel pressure forces the needle valve off its seat to allow injection
Position of the rig's weight indicator where Hook load is zero
مته ای که بتازگی درون چاه شده است
NEUTRON FORMATION DENSITY, Log Curve name
یکی از لاگ‌های مربوط به وایر لاین است
سوپروایزر یا ناظر حفاری شیفت شب یا کمپانی من شب
A rock without porosity, e.g. I
A short, threaded tubular coupling used for making connections between pipe joints and other tools
To bolt together various valves or fittings, as to Nipple Up the Blow
Out Preventors or the Christmas Tree
In drilling, to assemble the blowout preventer stack on the Wellhead at the surface

stimulation process first used about a hundred years ago in Pennsylvania. Nitroglycerine is placed in a well and exploded to fracture the rock. Sand and gravel or cement is usually placed above the explosive charge to improve the efficiency of the shot. Nitro shooting has been largely replaced by Formation fracturing
بدون وارد شدن سیال به چاه
به وضعیت ساکن چاه اطلاق می‌شود
No Loss, No Gain, mostly write with capital letters as : NL
MAGNETIC RESONANCE IMAGING LOG, Log Curve name
NUCLEAR MAGNETIC RESONANCE LOG, Log Curve name
بدون وارد شدن سیال به چاه
به وضعیت ساکن چاه اطلاق می‌شود
SPL, also write mostly as : N.S
فاصله ای از چاه که به هر دلیلی فاقد نمونە حفاری می‌باشد
NS, also refer to as : NSO or N
در مورد نمونه‌های حفاری یا حتی گل حفاری نیز بکار برده می‌شود
NT, actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیات انجام شده بدون هیچ مسیله ای
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
A gauge run downhole to verify dimensions

A special nipple made up in the tubing, casing, or drill pipe string the configuration of which is such that a tool contacting it can pass through only if the tool is in the proper position or configuration
Natural gas which is in reservoirs that do not contain significant quantities of crude oil
سنگ یا نمونه حفاری که فاقد آهک است
سنگ یا نمونه حفاری که فاقد آهک است
emulsion muds, the continuous phase of which does not conduct electricity, e.g. : Oil
سنگ یا نمونه حفاری که فاقد دانه‌های االیت است
سنگ یا نمونه حفاری که فاقد دانه‌های االیت است

The smooth, uninterrupted circulation of drilling fluid down the drill stem, out the bit, up the annular space between the pipe and the hole, and back to the surface. Compare also with : Reverse Circulation
Formation fluid pressure equivalent to about 0.465 pounds per square foot of depth from the surface. If the formation pressure is 4,650 pounds per square inch at 10,000 feet, it is considered normal
The normal pressure divided by true vertical depth
NA, also refer to as : N/A

A passageway through Jet Bits that causes the drilling fluid to be ejected from the bit at high velocity. The jet of mud clears the bottom of the hole. Nozzles come in different sizes that can be interchanged on the bit to adjust the velocity with which the mud exits the Bit
. The part of the fuel system of an engine that has small holes in it to permit fuel to enter the cylinder. Properly known as a Fuel
injection Nozzle, but also called : a Spray Valve. The Needle Valve is directly above the Nozzle
No Show, also refer to as : N
در مورد نمونه‌های حفاری یا حتی گل حفاری نیز بکار برده می‌شود
No Show, also write as : N/S or NS or NSO
در مورد نمونه‌های حفاری یا حتی گل حفاری نیز بکار برده می‌شود
No Show, also write as : NS or N
در مورد نمونه‌های حفاری یا حتی گل حفاری نیز بکار برده می‌شود
No Sample, also commonly write as : N.S
فاصله ای از چاه که به هر دلیلی فاقد نمونە حفاری می‌باشد
Night Drilling Supervisor, mostly write with capital letters as : NSV
No Trouble, This is compulsory to be filled in the case of no problem or trouble, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
No Trouble, NT , actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد و معمولا با حروف بزرگ نوشته می‌شود
NUCLEAR/OLD GAMMA RAY NEUTRON, Log Curve name
